languages.text: "Те, что доступны лишь избранным, присягнувшим мне, своему Господину. Тайные слова, изреченные на заре времен, что несут смерть и разруху тем, чьих ушей они коснулись. Истинные имена забытых божеств, что призовут тебе на службу алчущие крови тени. Забытые знания, которые способны творить и стирать в порошок империи. Все это может стать твоим, если ты признаешь меня своим Господином и пойдешь по пути, что я укажу".

"Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."
languages.original_text: "Те, что доступны лишь избранным, присягнувшим мне, своему Господину. Тайные слова, изреченные на заре времен, что несут смерть и разруху тем, чьих ушей они коснулись. Истинные имена забытых божеств, что призовут тебе на службу алчущие крови тени. Забытые знания, которые способны творить и стирать в порошок империи. Все это может стать твоим, если ты признаешь меня своим Господином и пойдешь по пути, что я укажу".

languages.text: “只有极少数向我宣誓效忠，称呼我为主人的人，才能知道那些秘密。那些秘密的话语起源于时间诞生之初，会给所有听到的人带来死亡与毁灭。当你呼唤着被遗忘的诸神真正的名字时，嗜血的影子会被召唤而来，为你而战。有了那些被遗忘的知识，你可以创造你自己的帝国，也可以将其他帝国化为齑粉。只要你承认我是你的主人，按照我指引的道路前进，这一切都可以为你所有。”
languages.original_text: "Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."

traits.locale_text: “只有极少数向我宣誓效忠，称呼我为主人的人，才能知道那些秘密。那些秘密的话语起源于时间诞生之初，会给所有听到的人带来死亡与毁灭。当你呼唤着被遗忘的诸神真正的名字时，嗜血的影子会被召唤而来，为你而战。有了那些被遗忘的知识，你可以创造你自己的帝国，也可以将其他帝国化为齑粉。只要你承认我是你的主人，按照我指引的道路前进，这一切都可以为你所有。”
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: "Solche, die nur den wenigen Auserwählten offenbart werden, die mir als ihrem Meister die Treue geschworen haben. Die geheimen Worte, die zum Anbeginn der Zeit gesprochen wurden und all jenen, deren Ohren sie erreichen, Tod und Zerstörung bringen. Die wahren Namen der vergessenen Gottheiten, die blutrünstige Schatten rufen, Euch zu dienen. Vergessenes Wissen, das ein Reich erschaffen oder eines pulverisieren kann. All das kann Euer sein, wenn Ihr mich als Euren Meister anerkennt und den Pfad nehmt, den ich Euch zeige."
languages.original_text: "Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."

traits.locale_text: "Solche, die nur den wenigen Auserwählten offenbart werden, die mir als ihrem Meister die Treue geschworen haben. Die geheimen Worte, die zum Anbeginn der Zeit gesprochen wurden und all jenen, deren Ohren sie erreichen, Tod und Zerstörung bringen. Die wahren Namen der vergessenen Gottheiten, die blutrünstige Schatten rufen, Euch zu dienen. Vergessenes Wissen, das ein Reich erschaffen oder eines pulverisieren kann. All das kann Euer sein, wenn Ihr mich als Euren Meister anerkennt und den Pfad nehmt, den ich Euch zeige."
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: «Unos que solo son revelados a los pocos elegidos que me han jurado lealtad como su maestro. Unas palabras secretas que se pronunciaron en los albores del tiempo y que llevan la muerte y la desolación a quienes las oyen. Los auténticos nombres de deidades olvidadas que conjuran sombras sanguinarias a tu servicio. Conocimientos prohibidos capaces de crear un imperio o reducirlo a polvo. Todo eso puede ser tuyo si me admites como tu maestro y emprendes el camino que te enseñe».
languages.original_text: "Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."

Todo eso puede ser tuyo si me admites como tu maestro y emprendes el camino que te enseñe».
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: « Ceux qui ne sont révélés qu'aux élus qui me reconnaissent comme leur maître et m'ont juré fidélité. Les mots secrets qui furent prononcés à l'aube des temps et qui apportent mort et destruction à quiconque les entend. Les véritables noms de divinités oubliées grâce auxquels des ombres assoiffées de sang viendront vous servir. Des connaissances disparues capables aussi bien de créer des empires que de les anéantir. Tout cela, vous l'apprendrez si vous m'acceptez comme maître et choisissez de suivre la voie que je vous indiquerai. »
languages.original_text: "Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui ne sont révélés qu'aux élus qui me reconnaissent comme leur maître et m'ont juré fidélité. Les mots secrets qui furent prononcés à l'aube des temps et qui apportent mort et destruction à quiconque les entend. Les véritables noms de divinités oubliées grâce auxquels des ombres assoiffées de sang viendront vous servir. Des connaissances disparues capables aussi bien de créer des empires que de les anéantir. Tout cela, vous l'apprendrez si vous m'acceptez comme maître et choisissez de suivre la voie que je vous indiquerai. »
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: 「私をマスターとして忠誠を誓った、選ばれた少数の者たちだけに明かされるもの。それが耳に届く者すべてに死と破滅をもたらす太古の昔に語られた秘密の言葉。お前に仕える血に飢えた影を召喚する、忘れ去られた神々の真名。帝国を築くことも、帝国を打ちのめすこともできる忘れ去られた知識。私を主と認め、私の示す道を歩めば、そのすべてがお前のものとなろう」
languages.original_text: "Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."

traits.locale_text: 「私をマスターとして忠誠を誓った、選ばれた少数の者たちだけに明かされるもの。それが耳に届く者すべてに死と破滅をもたらす太古の昔に語られた秘密の言葉。お前に仕える血に飢えた影を召喚する、忘れ去られた神々の真名。帝国を築くことも、帝国を打ちのめすこともできる忘れ去られた知識。私を主と認め、私の示す道を歩めば、そのすべてがお前のものとなろう」
traits.speaker: Eufrates_LordOfChange_unit

languages.text: "Yalnızca bana sadakat yemini etmiş, seçili birkaç kişiye açıklanan sırlar var. Zamanın şafağında konuşulan, işitenlere ölüm ve yıkım götüren gizli sözcükler bunlar. Sana hizmet etmesi için kana susamış gölgeler çağırmanı sağlayan, unutulmuş varlıkların gerçek isimleri... Bir imparatorluğu kurabilecek ya da yerle yeksan edebilecek unutulmuş irfan... Beni efendin olarak kabul edip sana gösterdiğim yolda yürümeye ant içersen hepsi senin olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Ones that are only revealed to the select few who have sworn fealty to me as their master. The secret words spoken at the dawn of time that bring death and ruin to all whose ears they reach. The true names of forgotten deities that will summon bloodthirsty shadows to serve you. Forgotten knowledge that can create an empire or pulverise one. All of that can be yours if you acknowledge me as your master and take the path that I show you."
